message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.RO 

The paper proposes a method based on convolutional neural networks for predicting the duration of laparoscopic interventions using unlabeled data from endoscopic image and surgical device streams. This involves analyzing the workflow of the intervention online and automatically predicting the remaining duration. The paper uses a diverse range of sensors in the operating room, making it relevant to the fields of computer vision (cs.CV), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), human-computer interaction (cs.HC), and robotics (cs.RO).
